titles: The Holy fast of Lent defended against all its prophaners, or, A Discourse shewing that Lent-fast was first taught the world by the apostles, as Dr. Gunning, now Bishop of Ely learnedly proved in a sermon printed by him in the year 1662 by His Majesties special command together with a practical direction how to fast.
author: Gunning, Peter, 1614-1684.
notes: Errors in paging: pages 23-24 skipped in the numbering.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
